titles.title: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2013
Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2013
To amend the National Labor Relations Act to require the arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health, Employment, Labor, and Pensions.

bill.summary: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2013 - Amends the National Labor Relations Act to require mediation and, if necessary, binding arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes.
